subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Here are some of the markers of baseball’s long journey from early April to Sunday, from the year’s seven no-hitters (by six pitchers) to the 11 triples compiled by a 260-pound designated hitter.
snippet: Here are some of the markers of baseball’s long journey from early April to Sunday, from the year’s seven no-hitters (by six pitchers) to the 11 triples compiled by a 260-pound designated hitter.
